DrifterMod:Sixty.NAME: Last-Second Turn
DrifterMod:Sixty.DESCRIPTION: driftermod:Drift !M!. NL If you have 2 or fewer cards in your hand, driftermod:Drift !DrifterMod:M2!.

DrifterMod:HairPin.NAME: Hairpin Turn
DrifterMod:HairPin.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have no driftermod:Drift, driftermod:Drift !M!.

DrifterMod:SpinOut.NAME: Spin Out
DrifterMod:SpinOut.DESCRIPTION: driftermod:Activate your driftermod:Drift. NL Gain !M! Thorns for each driftermod:Drift for one turn. NL Lose your driftermod:Drift.

DrifterMod:Ninety.NAME: 90 Degree Turn
DrifterMod:Ninety.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL driftermod:Drift !M!. NL Gain !DrifterMod:M2! Strength while Drifting.

DrifterMod:EngineRev.NAME: Engine Rev
DrifterMod:EngineRev.DESCRIPTION: Innate NL Draw !M! cards and gain !M! [E] next turn. NL Exhaust.

DrifterMod:Coast.NAME: Coast
DrifterMod:Coast.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Retain !M! cards this turn.

DrifterMod:HardPass.NAME: Hard Pass
DrifterMod:HardPass.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this kills an enemy, gain 1 driftermod:Speed.

DrifterMod:Tmph.NAME: 20 MPH
DrifterMod:Tmph.DESCRIPTION: Discard !M! cards from your driftermod:Total-hand to deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL ( Discard 2 more cards and double this card's damage for each driftermod:Speed. )

DrifterMod:NightsOnFire.NAME: Nights of Fire
DrifterMod:NightsOnFire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !DrifterMod:M2! damage plus !M! for each driftermod:Overdraw. NL (Deals !D! damage.)

DrifterMod:BobWeave.NAME: Bob and Weave
DrifterMod:BobWeave.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards next turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards next turn.
Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards next turn.

DrifterMod:PolePosition.NAME: Pole Position
DrifterMod:PolePosition.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and gain !B! Block. NL If your hand is full, this costs 0.

DrifterMod:TopSpeed.NAME: Full Throttle
DrifterMod:TopSpeed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Retain your hand this turn.

DrifterMod:UTurn.NAME: U-Turn
DrifterMod:UTurn.DESCRIPTION: driftermod:Activate your Drift. NL Draw cards next turn equal to your driftermod:Drift. NL Lose your driftermod:Drift.

DrifterMod:EatMyDust.NAME: Overtake
DrifterMod:EatMyDust.DESCRIPTION: Discard 3 cards to draw !M! cards next turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I don't have enough cards to discard!

DrifterMod:ThermalEngine.NAME: Thermal Engine
DrifterMod:ThermalEngine.DESCRIPTION: The first time you would draw while your hand is full each turn, gain [E].

DrifterMod:Kachow.NAME: Headlight Flash
DrifterMod:Kachow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply 1 Weak to all enemies.

DrifterMod:PerfectBalance.NAME: Perfect Balance
DrifterMod:PerfectBalance.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if you played an even number of cards last turn, Draw a card.
DrifterMod:PerfectBalance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, if you played an even number of cards last turn, Draw !M! card.

DrifterMod:Dejavu.NAME: Deja Vu
DrifterMod:Dejavu.DESCRIPTION: Play the last card you played this combat.
DrifterMod:Dejavu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upgrade and play the last card you played this combat.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I haven't been in this place before.

DrifterMod:Zoom.NAME: Zoom
DrifterMod:Zoom.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When you draw a card this turn, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

DrifterMod:BigCrash.NAME: Hyper Crash
DrifterMod:BigCrash.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times your driftermod:Total-Hand. Discard your hand and lose all driftermod:Overdraw. NL ( !D! damage. )

DrifterMod:InControl.NAME: Tenacity
DrifterMod:InControl.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard a card. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.
DrifterMod:InControl.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard a card. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.

DrifterMod:RacingSpirit.NAME: Racing Spirit
DrifterMod:RacingSpirit.DESCRIPTION: If you have 2 or fewer cards in hand, deal !D! damage and draw !M! cards.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I need to have 2 or fewer cards.

DrifterMod:InTheZone.NAME: In the Zone
DrifterMod:InTheZone.DESCRIPTION: When you draw a card during your turn, gain !M! Block.

DrifterMod:SafeDriving.NAME: Safe Driving
DrifterMod:SafeDriving.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Lose 1 driftermod:Speed, and if you did, gain !M! Block.

DrifterMod:Nitrus.NAME: Nitrus
DrifterMod:Nitrus.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Gain 1 driftermod:Speed. NL Exhaust.
DrifterMod:Nitrus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Gain 1 driftermod:Speed. NL Exhaust.

DrifterMod:SpeedDemon.NAME: Speed Demon
DrifterMod:SpeedDemon.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 driftermod:Speed. NL Deal !M! damage for each driftermod:Speed. NL ( !D! Damage. )

DrifterMod:SpeedBurst.NAME: Speed Burst
DrifterMod:SpeedBurst.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Retain !M! cards this turn.

DrifterMod:FireTrail.NAME: Flame Trail
DrifterMod:FireTrail.DESCRIPTION: At the end of the turn, all enemies lose HP equal to your driftermod:Total-hand.

DrifterMod:Dangerous.NAME: Dangerous Game
DrifterMod:Dangerous.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This costs 1 less for each Vulnerable you have.

DrifterMod:Underdog.NAME: Natural Talent
DrifterMod:Underdog.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this is discarded, add it to your hand. NL Whenever this is the only card in your hand, draw a card. NL Ethereal.
DrifterMod:Underdog.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this is discarded, add it to your hand. NL Whenever this is the only card in your hand, draw a card.

DrifterMod:OneThirtyFive.NAME: 135 Degree Turn
DrifterMod:OneThirtyFive.DESCRIPTION: driftermod:Drift !M!. NL This card's driftermod:Drift is affected by Strength and Dexterity.

DrifterMod:Intimidation.NAME: Intimidation
DrifterMod:Intimidation.DESCRIPTION: Apply your Vulnerable to all enemies. NL Draw a card.

DrifterMod:Daredevil.NAME: Daredevil
DrifterMod:Daredevil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL If you aren't Vulnerable, exhaust this card.

DrifterMod:EmergencyBrake.NAME: Emergency Brake
DrifterMod:EmergencyBrake.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block for each driftermod:Speed. NL Lose all driftermod:Speed.

DrifterMod:BrakeDrift.NAME: Brake-Drift
DrifterMod:BrakeDrift.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards. driftermod:Drift !M! and driftermod:Brake 1 for each discarded.

DrifterMod:Exhaustpipe.NAME: Exhaust Pipe
DrifterMod:Exhaustpipe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card to gain !B! Block.

DrifterMod:Burnout.NAME: Burnout
DrifterMod:Burnout.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Add a *Burn to your draw pile. NL Lose 1 driftermod:Speed.

DrifterMod:Manuever.NAME: Maneuver
DrifterMod:Manuever.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! driftermod:Traction this turn only.

DrifterMod:Recovery.NAME: Recovery
DrifterMod:Recovery.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards, lose 1 Vulnerable and gain !B! Block for each. NL Exhaust.
DrifterMod:Recovery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard any number of cards, lose 1 Vulnerable and gain !B! Block for each. NL Exhaust.

DrifterMod:SweepingTurn.NAME: Sweeping Turn
DrifterMod:SweepingTurn.DESCRIPTION: driftermod:Drift !M! NL Your driftermod:Drift hits all enemies this turn.

DrifterMod:GearUp.NAME: Gear Up
DrifterMod:GearUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Lose 2 Dexterity. NL Gain 1 Speed.

DrifterMod:GearDown.NAME: Gear Down
DrifterMod:GearDown.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Lose 2 Strength. NL Lose 1 Speed, and if you did gain !B! Block.

DrifterMod:OneEighty.NAME: 180 Degree Turn
DrifterMod:OneEighty.DESCRIPTION: driftermod:Drift !M!. NL Gain !DrifterMod:M2! driftermod:Traction next turn only.

DrifterMod:Determined.NAME: Second Wind
DrifterMod:Determined.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have 2 or fewer cards in your hand, gain [E] [E] .
DrifterMod:Determined.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have 2 or fewer cards in your hand, gain [E] [E] [E] .

DrifterMod:RoadRage.NAME: Road Rage
DrifterMod:RoadRage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard all Skills in your hand, replace them with *RAGE.

DrifterMod:FinalGambit.NAME: Final Gambit
DrifterMod:FinalGambit.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until your hand is full. NL Gain [E] for each card drawn. NL Die next turn. NL Exhaust.

DrifterMod:Resolve.NAME: Resolve
DrifterMod:Resolve.DESCRIPTION: While you have 2 or fewer cards in hand, gain !M! more damage, Block and driftermod:Drift from your cards.

DrifterMod:Fierce.NAME: Fierce
DrifterMod:Fierce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Increased by 2 for each Vulnerable you have.

DrifterMod:RiskyApproach.NAME: Risky Approach
DrifterMod:RiskyApproach.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Vulnerable. NL Draw !M! cards next turn.

DrifterMod:CruiseControl.NAME: Cruise Control
DrifterMod:CruiseControl.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Dexterity. NL Your driftermod:Speed is considered to be !M! less for its negative effects.

DrifterMod:Equalize.NAME: Recovery
DrifterMod:Equalize.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL Heal !M! for each Vulnerable you have. NL Lose all Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

DrifterMod:NaturalTalent.NAME: Relentless
DrifterMod:NaturalTalent.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card. NL When this is discarded, add it to your hand and increase its draw by 1.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL When discarded, return this to your hand and increase its draw by 1.

DrifterMod:FuelReserve.NAME: Fuel Reserves
DrifterMod:FuelReserve.DESCRIPTION: The first time you have no cards in your hand, draw !M! cards.

DrifterMod:AllTheStops.NAME: All the Stops
DrifterMod:AllTheStops.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Vulnerable, deal !D! damage again. NL If you have 2 or fewer cards in hand, deal !D! damage again.

DrifterMod:LastResort.NAME: Last Resort
DrifterMod:LastResort.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Put a card from your draw pile into your hand.
DrifterMod:LastResort.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Put a card from your draw pile into your hand. NL Gain [E] .

DrifterMod:Adaptability.NAME: Adaptability
DrifterMod:Adaptability.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL While your hand is empty this turn, draw a card.

DrifterMod:DriftAhead.NAME: Drift Ahead
DrifterMod:DriftAhead.DESCRIPTION: driftermod:Activate your driftermod:Drift. NL Gain 1 driftermod:Speed for every !M! driftermod:Drift. NL Lose your driftermod:Drift.

DrifterMod:PoundPavement.NAME: Pound Pavement
DrifterMod:PoundPavement.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards X times. NL Retain your hand this turn. NL Exhaust.
DrifterMod:PoundPavement.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards X times. NL Retain your hand this turn. NL Gain [E] . NL Exhaust.

DrifterMod:AccelerationForm.NAME: Acceleration Form
DrifterMod:AccelerationForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, gain !M! driftermod:Speed.
DrifterMod:AccelerationForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! driftermod:Speed.

DrifterMod:DaringStunt.NAME: Daring Stunt
DrifterMod:DaringStunt.DESCRIPTION: Discard !DrifterMod:M2! cards to deal !D! damage. NL ( Number of cards to discard reduced by !M! for each Vulnerable you have. )
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ( Number of cards to discard reduced by !M! for each Vulnerable you have. )
